title: 1992 Major League Baseball expansion draft
summary: On November 17, 1992, during the 1992â€“93 offseason, Major League Baseball (MLB) held an expansion draft in New York City to allow two  expansion teams, the Florida Marlins and Colorado Rockies, to build their rosters prior to debuting in the National League's (NL) East and West divisions, respectively, in the 1993 MLB season.
